                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/122.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - August 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p> 
<p><b><u>Register Here</u></b><br>
<a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week.</p>
<p>All my best.</p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-aug_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith<br><b>Organizers:</b> Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.<br>
Department of Botany</p>

                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>

                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>

                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series: Talk No 03 - Planning for Your Graduate Studies and the Life Beyond</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>September 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, <strong>September 26, at 09:00 a.m</strong>. for the seminar titled “<strong>Planning for your graduate studies and the life beyond </strong>” by <strong>Dr. Dayanjan S Wijesinghe,</strong> Assistant Professor, School of Pharmacy,Virginia Commonwealth University, VA, USA.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. </p>
<p><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">Register Here :</span></strong> <a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-Sept_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>All my best. </p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<br><p><strong>Organizers: </strong>Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya</p>

                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series: Talk No 03 - Planning for Your Graduate Studies and the Life Beyond</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>September 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, <strong>September 26, at 09:00 a.m</strong>. for the seminar titled “<strong>Planning for your graduate studies and the life beyond </strong>” by <strong>Dr. Dayanjan S Wijesinghe,</strong> Assistant Professor, School of Pharmacy,Virginia Commonwealth University, VA, USA.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. </p>
<p><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">Register Here :</span></strong> <a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao</a></p>

                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>

<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>

                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p> 
<p><b><u>Register Here</u></b><br>
<a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week.</p>
<p>All my best.</p>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                      <img src="img/news/123.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series: Talk No 03 - Planning for Your Graduate Studies and the Life Beyond</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>September 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, <strong>September 26, at 09:00 a.m</strong>. for the seminar titled “<strong>Planning for your graduate studies and the life beyond </strong>” by <strong>Dr. Dayanjan S Wijesinghe,</strong> Assistant Professor, School of Pharmacy,Virginia Commonwealth University, VA, USA.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. </p>
<p><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">Register Here :</span></strong> <a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-Sept_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>All my best. </p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<br><p><strong>Organizers: </strong>Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya</p>

                      <img src="img/news/122.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - August 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p>

        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya

              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">

                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">

                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - August 2020</h3>

                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p> 
<p><b><u>Register Here</u></b><br>
<a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt</a></p>

        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                        <p><big><i class="fa fa-external-link-square"></i></big> <a href="http://www.eugc.ac.lk/qaa/" target="_blank">Quality Assuarance and Accreditation Council- University Grants Commission, Sri Lanla</a></p>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                        <!-- single accordian area -->
                        <div class="panel single-accordion">
                            <h6>
                                <a role="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseHeads" class="collapsed" data-parent="#accordion" data-toggle="collapse" href="#collapseHeads">Heads of Departments
                                        <span class="accor-open"><i class="fa fa-plus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
                                        <span class="accor-close"><i class="fa fa-minus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
                                    </a>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya

          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>

<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.

        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">

<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-Sept_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>All my best. </p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>

                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - August 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p> 
<p><b><u>Register Here</u></b><br>
<a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt</a></p>

<p>All my best.</p>

        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/121.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Fully Automatic Hand Washing Unit</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>A completely touch-free fully automatic hand-washing unit has been constructed in the Electronics Laboratory of the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science. The unit consists of a soap solution dispenser, a water tap and a hot-air dryer, all activated by infra-red sensors. This is the first hand-washing unit of this kind combining washing with soap and drying with hot air so that it is <strong>expected to be more effective against Covid-19</strong>. The project was initiated by <strong>Prof. H.M.N. Bandara</strong> and technical assistance was provided voluntarily by <strong>Mr. Mahinda Paranawitharana</strong>, Staff Technical Officer (Electronic) of the Department of Chemistry. Welding and other metal work were done voluntarily by the staff of the Department of Physics workshop. </p>
<br><p class="text-center"><img src="%5Cchemistry%5Cimg%5Cnews%5C121-1.png" width="90%"></p>
<br><p>The first unit constructed was donated to the Department of Chemistry and it is now in operation.  Construction of more of these units for the faculty is under way.
<br>
<br></p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">

                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                        <!-- single accordian area -->
                        <div class="panel single-accordion">
                            <h6>
                                <a role="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseHeads" class="collapsed" data-parent="#accordion" data-toggle="collapse" href="#collapseHeads">Heads of Departments
                                        <span class="accor-open"><i class="fa fa-plus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
                                        <span class="accor-close"><i class="fa fa-minus" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
                                    </a>
                            </h6>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

<div class="col-12 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="400ms">
                    <!--img src="../img/qac.png" class="img"-->
                    <h2>Quality Assurance Cell Faculty of Science (FQAC)</h2>
                    <h2 id="about" class="title-bg mt-50">About FQAC</h2>
                    <p>The Quality Assurance Cell of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Peradeniya was established in 2016 according to the guidelines given by the Quality Assurance Council of UGC. FQAC has a broad mandate of coordinating all the quality assurance related activities within the faculty in liaison with the Internal Quality Assurance Unit (IQAU) of the University in line with the UGC circular 04/2015.</p>

                    <p>It also promotes measures for faculty level functioning towards quality enhancement through internalizing best practices in academic, academic-related and administrative processes. </p>

                    <h2 id="members" class="title-bg mt-50">Members of the FQAC - 2020</h2>
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                    <table class="table table-striped">
                        <tr><th width="50%">Chairman</th><td>Sivakumar Dr. V. </td></tr>
                        <tr><th>Dean</th><td>Kodituwakku, Prof. SR</td></tr>
                    </table>
                    </div>

                        <!-- single accordian area -->

<div class="tyJCtd mGzaTb baZpAe"><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q"><br></p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q"><span style="font-family: Lato;"><strong> Introduction to Python programming language</strong></span> organized by the Computer Society University of Peradeniya (CSUP) highlighting the next level of the workshop  series </p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q" style="margin-left: 75pt; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 15pt;">on <span style="font-family: Lato;"><strong>5th of January 2021</strong></span> </p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q" style="margin-left: 75pt; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 15pt;">at <span style="font-family: Lato;"><strong>7pm </strong></span></p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q" style="margin-left: 75pt; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 15pt;">via <span style="font-family: Lato;"><strong>YouTube</strong></span>.</p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q" style="margin-left: 75pt; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 15pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q"><span class=" aw5Odc" style="text-decoration: underline;"><a class="XqQF9c" href="https://forms.gle/AB32AMDoQhreimAy6" target="_blank">Click here to </a></span><span class=" aw5Odc" style="font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;"><a class="XqQF9c" href="https://forms.gle/AB32AMDoQhreimAy6" target="_blank"><strong>Register</strong></a></span>. </p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q">Never end the learning journey of you!</p><p dir="ltr" class="CDt4Ke zfr3Q">Hurry &amp; garb the opportunity!!</p></div>

<div class="row">
                            <div class="col-12">
                                <h5 class="title-bg">Recent News and Events</h5>
                            </div>
        <!-- Single Blog Start -->
          <div class="col-12">
              <div class="single-blog-post mb-50 wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="300ms">
                  <!-- Post Thumb -->
                  <div class="blog-post-thumb mb-50">
                      <img src="img/news/120.png" alt="">
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - July 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>July 15, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear all, </p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, July 18, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>“Effects of elevated carbon dioxide plus chronic warming on plant nitrogen relations”</b> by <b>Dr. Dileepa Jayawardena</b>, Postdoctoral Fellow at Parma Research and Extension Center, University of Idaho. </p>
<p>After the talk we will discuss the obstacles and opportunities faced by International PhD students in USA with the aftermath of COVID-19. </p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. You will have an opportunity to submit questions in advance or during the live Zoom conversation. </p>
<p><strong><u>Register Here</u></strong></p><a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry" target="_blank">https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5MudeqgrDIvEtDmRgo_5ZrI5JrU7UGuE_Ry</a>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p> All my best. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>
<p>Organizers: Dr. Nalin Suranjith and Dr. Sarangi Athukorala.
<br>Department of Botany
<br>Faculty of Science
<br>University of Peradeniya
</p>
                  <!-- Read More btn -->
                  
               </div>
          </div>
                        </div>

                  <!-- Post Title -->
                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series: Talk No 03 - Planning for Your Graduate Studies and the Life Beyond</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>September 22, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya Virtual Speaker Series this Saturday, <strong>September 26, at 09:00 a.m</strong>. for the seminar titled “<strong>Planning for your graduate studies and the life beyond </strong>” by <strong>Dr. Dayanjan S Wijesinghe,</strong> Assistant Professor, School of Pharmacy,Virginia Commonwealth University, VA, USA.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate. </p>
<p><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">Register Here :</span></strong> <a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5Asd-quqjIiHNd0-1EHLzvCvovsuRoUQEao</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week. </p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-Sept_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
<p>All my best. </p>
<p>Dr. Nalin Suranjith </p>

                  <h3 class="post-title">Virtual Speaker Series - August 2020</h3>
                  <!-- Post Meta -->
                  <div class="post-meta">
                      <p>August 11, 2020</p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Post Excerpt -->
                  <p>Dear All,</p>
<p>Please join us for the Department of Botany, University of Peradeniya <b>Virtual Speaker Series</b> this Sunday, August 16, at 09:00 a.m. for the seminar titled <b>"Knowledge of Plant Biology: Key to Growing Better Crops"</b> by <b>Dr. Tharindu Weeraratne</b>, Director of Crop Science and Agronomy, Autogrow, New Zealand.</p> 
<p>After the talk, we will discuss the study and career opportunities in New Zealand.</p>
<p>Space is limited, so please register to participate.</p> 
<p><b><u>Register Here</u></b><br>
<a href="https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-video-camera" aria-hidden="true" style="background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; padding: 5px; border-radius: 5px; "></i> https://learn.zoom.us/meeting/register/u5YvcuqsrjooGNyG1KqBfSPJgkfkAObgIKKt</a></p>
<p>We look forward to seeing you at the event later this week.</p>
<p>All my best.</p>
<p><a href="/botany/news/Talk-Flyer-aug_2020.pdf" target="_blank" class="float-right btn academy-btn btn-4 m-2">See the Poster</a></p>
